label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_004
content:
## 2024-09-05 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 10190433
- Unique source IPs: 1602
- Unique destination IPs: 4427
- Average flow duration (sec): 40.1
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 84.3
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 13.0
- ICMP percentage: 1.1
- Long-lived flows greater than 1 hour: 98
- East-West traffic percentage: 56.3

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3878183
- Unique domains: 40977
- NXDOMAIN responses: 13515
- DGA suspected domains: 3
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 2824
- Average response time (ms): 6.3
- Cache hit percentage: 82.9
- TXT record queries: 670
- PTR queries: 6234

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 540
- Blocked by IPS: 164
- Signature matches: 556
- Anomaly detections: 15
- Severity critical: 3
- Severity high: 17
- Severity medium: 50
- Severity low: 321
- False positive rate percentage: 15.0
- Top signatures:
  - GPL SNMP public access udp
  - ET EXPLOIT Apache Log4j RCE Attempt
  - ET WEB_SERVER SQL Injection Attempt

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 4.22
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 3.33
- WAN peak (Gbps): 8.2
- LAN core utilization percentage: 46.1
- DMZ utilization percentage: 27.9
- VPN concentrator sessions: 191
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 1.1
- Top talker IP: 10.40.70.142
- Top talker bytes (GB): 41.5

### Bgp Changes

- Prefix withdrawals: 1
- AS path changes: 0
- Route flaps: 2
- Peer sessions established: 4
- Peer sessions down: 1
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 0

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 6
- New entries for org domains: 4
- Suspicious issuances: 0
- Expired certificates in use: 2
- TLS 1.0 connections: 5
- TLS 1.1 connections: 20
- TLS 1.2 connections: 72785
- TLS 1.3 connections: 177727
- Weak cipher usage: 3

### Infrastructure
#### netflow-collector-01
- CPU percentage: 64
- Memory percentage: 74
- Disk percentage: 67
#### dns-resolver-01
- CPU percentage: 23
- Memory percentage: 60
- Cache size (GB): 3.5
#### ids-sensor-01
- CPU percentage: 43
- Memory percentage: 50
- PPS: 142619
#### ids-sensor-02
- CPU percentage: 53
- Memory percentage: 55
- PPS: 73191
#### border-router-01

- Memory percentage: 31
- Interface errors: 2

### Events
- Bandwidth: WAN peak at 90.7% capacity — capacity planning review
- CT log alert: new certificate for *.company.com issued by DigiCert — verified as authorized

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-05. 10190433 flows analyzed. 3878183 DNS queries. 540 IDS alerts (3 critical, 17 high). WAN avg 4.22/3.33 Gbps in/out. 1 BGP announcements.
